actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of law establishing a fund to promote the free flow of domestically produced fishing industry products in order to increase the amounts in such fund.

summary.text: Increases to 100 percent (now 30 percent) the amount of the gross receipts from duties on fishery products which shall be transferred by the Secretary of Agriculture to the Secretary of the Interior to be used to promote the free flow of domestically produced fishery products.

titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of law establishing a fund to promote the free flow of domestically produced fishing industry products in order to increase the amounts in such fund.
